sqlMap.sql: select u.RESV_STOCK_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.SAFE_STORE_NUM, u.MIN_STORE_NUM, u.REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_RESV_STOCK u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt from DRP_RESV_STOCK u
sqlMap.insert: insert into DRP_RESV_STOCK( RESV_STOCK_ID, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, PRD_NAME, PRD_SPEC, PRD_COLOR, BRAND, STD_UNIT, SAFE_STORE_NUM, MIN_STORE_NUM, REMARK, CRE_NAME, CREATOR, CRE_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, STATE, DEL_FLAG )values( #RESV_STOCK_ID#, #PRD_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #PRD_NAME#, #PRD_SPEC#, #PRD_COLOR#, #BRAND#, #STD_UNIT#, #SAFE_STORE_NUM#, #MIN_STORE_NUM#, #REMARK#, #CRE_NAME#, #CREATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #STATE#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update DRP_RESV_STOCK
PRD_NO = #PRD_NO# PRD_NAME = #PRD_NAME# PRD_SPEC = #PRD_SPEC# PRD_COLOR = #PRD_COLOR# BRAND = #BRAND# STD_UNIT = #STD_UNIT# SAFE_STORE_NUM = #SAFE_STORE_NUM# MIN_STORE_NUM = #MIN_STORE_NUM# REMARK = #REMARK# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = sysdate STATE = #STATE#
where RESV_STOCK_ID = #RESV_STOCK_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_RESV_STOCK set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where RESV_STOCK_ID = #RESV_STOCK_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.RESV_STOCK_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.SAFE_STORE_NUM, u.MIN_STORE_NUM, u.REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from DRP_RESV_STOCK u where u.RESV_STOCK_ID = #RESV_STOCK_ID#
sqlMap.update: update DRP_RESV_STOCK set STATE = #STATE# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where RESV_STOCK_ID = #RESV_STOCK_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select count(u.PRD_ID) from DRP_RESV_STOCK u where u.LEDGER_ID=#LEDGER_ID# and u.PRD_ID =#PRD_ID# and u.DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG#
u.RESV_STOCK_ID != #RESV_STOCK_ID#
